function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Assuming 80% efficacy of personal protective measures against mosquitos may lead to underestimation of transmission rates and disease spread.","Impact":"Higher transmission rates and increased disease spread due to lower actual effectiveness of personal protective measures.","Mitigation":"Conduct studies to accurately assess the efficacy of personal protective measures against mosquitos. Educate and inform the population about the actual effectiveness of different protective measures.","Technologies":"Research methods for assessing the effectiveness of personal protective measures, communication technologies for public education.","People":"Susceptible individuals, population at risk of mosquito-borne diseases.","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions, public health authorities."}]}
